alert.note: Alert for Stokes (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 8:32PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Stokes County through 900 PM EDT... At 832 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Francisco, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danbury... Francisco... Sandy Ridge... Dillard... Collinstown... Prestonville... and Ayersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
